c_details.value: Rocker-Camber-Rocker – Tip Rocker: 143 = 270mm, 150 = 285mm, 157 = 300mm, 164 = 310mm | Camber: All Sizes = 3mm | Tail Rocker: 143 = 220mm, 150 = 230mm, 157 = 240mm, 164 = 250mm

Elliptical Sidecut – Elliptical Sidecut is made up of a longer radius underfoot and shorter radii in the tip and tail of the ski. The long radius underfoot means you can pivot faster and easier, while a shorter radius in the tip and tail result in easier turn initiation. This sidecut allows for a wide variety of turn lengths, angles and mounting positions.

Directional Twin – A considerably skinnier tail width than in the tip provides ultimate downhill performance for attacking the mountain. A twin tip in the tail encourages playfulness and freestyle attitude, meaning you can ride switch with ease.

Fusion Wood Core – Our Fusion Wood Core technology is implemented in the Prodigy 0. 600mm of light poplar wood in the center of the ski ensures proper binding retention and solid downhill performance, while foam in the tips and tails provides a light swing weight that is appreciated by up-and-coming rippers.

Microcap Full Strength Sidewall – Micro-cap construction is a hybrid of a premium, sandwich sidewall construction fused with a lightweight, durable cap construction. With micro-cap, the sandwich construction provides awesome edge hold and torsional stability while the ski’s topsheet wraps around and meets the sidewall, protecting the fragile joint that can be prone to chipping.

XL 2.5mm Edges – Fractions of a millimeter might not sound like much, but when it comes to edges, it adds up. The 2.5mm edges stack an extra 25% of height on top of our already super-durable standard 2.0mm edges. This extra steel gives the rider a pair of skis that are going to take more abuse and last longer.
We recommend a brake width equal to or at most 15 mm wider than the ski waist width.

content.description: The Faction Prodigy 0X Skis (that's "Zero-Ex") are a light and nimble freeride ski perfect for younger and lighter skiers just getting into the freestyle ranks, who need a reliable tool for progression that's forgiving but dependable. An 85mm waisted design makes the 0X easier to coax into the turn and lighter than the other Prodigy models, but the basic design philosophy and rocker profile remain constant. Step it up with the 0X for straight up fun from day one.
content.name: Faction Prodigy 0X Skis - Women's 2023
